39412628.review:
平台跳跃类游戏，比较难，几乎没有水平方向的惯性设定，有全球排行榜，游戏模式有好几种（单人主线+DLC，双人主线+DLC，隐藏关，单人竞速模式，多人隐藏关积分赛，单人主线伪一命模式）。可惜不支持线上联机和创意工坊。这款游戏好评很多，我的差评是针对速通玩家而言的，如果你只是想自己或者和朋友（不会打起来的那种）玩一下放松心情的话，我会推荐它，毕竟这游戏只要求任意一个角色到达终点，即使是0分也算通关，存档点（游戏内不会显示）还很多。

    首先这个游戏的优点是有的，主要是创意很好（单人控制两个、双人控制四个角色过关），此外音乐不错，画风方面虽然线条有棱有角却又有细腻的感觉。

    但是这游戏有几个十分蛋疼的问题，让人感觉好像吃蛋糕吃出一片指甲大小的蛋壳一样。

1、最明显的一个问题，排行榜上有很多明显是作弊（修改）的成绩，比如一关超过70分，或者五秒之内结束战斗之类的。顺便说一下，排行榜上有一个叫DevilSquirrel和一个叫SonicScrewdrivr的玩家，据我所知他们是TAS（伪一命模式除外）（不过他们手打的纪录也很快，应该都是全球第一或第二），比他们快五秒以上的基本上可以判定是作弊了（其实我觉得半秒就足够判定了）。有趣的是，排行榜上还有不少以Ibtest-为前缀的名字，如果我没理解错，这是官方测试游戏所用的账号。这些不正常的纪录，我认为官方有责任清理。

2、也是一个很明显的问题，成就“Faster than a Shaman（Set a time in all levels in Puma Mode）”和“Perfect Spiritual Harmony（Get a gold totem in every level. Finish Old Skool and Puma Mode.）”无法通过正常途径完成。前者字面意思是在竞速模式（Puma Mode，猎豹模式）下的所有关卡超越游戏自带的（HoeBear的）纪录（在关卡中可以看到HoeBear所操作角色的虚影）。游戏的单人共34关（主线（7常规+1BOSS）*3层世界+10DLC虚空关），出于某种原因，竞速模式去掉了其中的3个BOSS关，也就是说只有31关，然而这个成就要求的数量是34关（所以说官方是⑨吗）。后者的字面意思是全关金图腾且完成伪一命模式（Old Skool Mode）和竞速模式。然而有一个问题，现在我已经单双人主线加DLC全金，而且在竞速模式几乎所有的关卡刷到全球前50（总之是很快啦……），只差一个伪一命模式没过，但成就进度始终是0/90。我问了一个朋友 @星影爱听纯音乐 ，成就说明里提到的条件他都满足了（包括伪一命模式，他在那个模式的成绩排名是全球第一），他也是0/90。此外我实在是不明白90是怎么算出来的。综上所述，这两个成就目前无法通过正常途径获得，我计划在完成伪一命模式后用SAM解锁这两个成就。

3、成就“Déjà vu（Play through "DJ Steelface" twice, in one go, without dying）”对应的关卡有BUG，我在尝试获得这个成就的时候前两次一命回到终点后都没能成功，后来经过星影的指导才知道自己前两次卡了两个不同的BUG导致解锁成就失败（怕不是有非洲血统）。两个BUG具体是怎样的我已经不记得了，总之失败了就要再来一次（严格来讲是两次）。

4、角色死亡之后会有一段回到存档点的动画，在这个动画播放的过程中无法暂停，从而无法马上重开关卡；在关卡内重开后会立刻重新开始计时，也可以控制角色移动，但会有半秒左右的画面切换动画，导致玩家只能在看不到角色和地图的时候进行操作，而有些关卡在开始后很短的时间内就需要进行比较复杂的操作（比如说我今天刷了一个小时的单人DLC第9关）。这两个设定对普通玩家没什么好处，但对像我一样刷纪录的玩家来说显然是极其不友好的，尤其是比较难的关卡，重开的过程很费时间。

    为什么以上的这些小问题会导致我打差评呢，这是因为这些问题都是可以轻松地解决的（第3个除外，我不太清楚这个有没有可能修复），然而官方对它们却不管不顾。打出这个差评，我自己也是觉得很可惜的，游戏是好游戏，只是游戏体验太差了。

    最后还是那句话：你只是想玩一下的话，那就买吧，我推荐；但如果你想挑战速通和全成就，那我不建议你在这个游戏上太用心，不然你会很累。

38128922.review:
知り合いからギフトで頂きました。

2つ同時に動くトーテムを操作してトークンを集めたり敵を交わしたり、特徴としては斑鳩的な属性システムがあり特定の地形は特定の属性でした通り抜けられません。また、お互いの位置を一瞬で交換出来るボタンがあり、斑鳩＋同時操作のある横スクロールアクションと言った趣のゲームです。途中、どうやって通り抜けるかわかりにくい地形もありますが、じっくり考えながら通り抜けるのも面白い。死にゲーの部類ですが、チェックポイントも多く、特別意地の悪い仕掛けはないような気がします。とはいえ、ノーミスの称号が各面にあるので、それを狙うと難しいところ。

三角形のタイルで構成されるグラフィックが独特の味わいを醸し出しています。

とりあえずの全クリアは急げば3時間～4時間程度。時間を競ったり、トークンを全部集めたりなどのやりこみ要素もあります。

協力プレイは未プレイなのですが、ローカルしか実装されてないのが惜しい。ボイスチャット等で誰かとやってみたいのですが、比較的リアルタイム性を要求されそうなので難しいのかもしれません。

980円と言われるとうーん、って感じもしますがセールの時などは買ってもいいかもしれません。

33827698.review:
Kalimba is a solo co-op platformer, which basically means that you control two totems at the same time. They move left and right at the same time and jump at the same time. There's also a button for instant-switching which'll come in handy once the game starts to explore its basic premise. Because, you guessed it: the moment either one of your characters hits an enemy or the black void, you're thrown back to the last checkpoint to try again.

It's a hard game, but not an unfair one: respawning is instantaneous, and aside from being awarded a lesser trophy at the end (for which you must also collect coins) there is no drawback. In other words: this game encourages you in the right way to get to the next part.

While this game ticks all the boxes it needs to be for today's standards (nice visuals, enough story to keep you engaged without beating your head in with it, tight controls, decent difficulty curve) it absolutely shines in the level design department.  The first couple of levels are meant to familiarize yourself with the odd two player handling. You are introduced to the way jumping and double jumping works, basic enemies, jump pads and such. It also shows you colored lava parts, which gradually introduces you into switching your guys around (one of 'em is always immune to it). Then it starts messing around with one of your characters: it reverses the gravity, increases its size and jump ability, makes it fly...combine this with the switching ability and you've got an incredibly interesting way to traverse levels. Kalimba isn't the first game where you need two characters to work closely together, but its brilliance lies in how everything is designed so you can actually do this with just one player controlling both at the same time.

Make no mistake: this is an absolute gem and VERY well worth playing. I haven't played the multiplayer or even the full singleplayer game yet, but thus far it has been worth every cent to me.

33005840.review:
Awesome game for local coop, mainly between 2 people because theres a long and challenging 2 player campaign. But theres also a turn based mode for up to i think 5 or 6 people where you beat each others scores like a penalty shootout. 

Seriously though for what it is, this is a 10/10 game! It looks fantastic, good sound, good overall design, great and original game play and a lot of unique game mechanics. Its also got a lot of style and comedy in terms of the writing. 

1 player is ok and will really push your brain to new levels. But the best experience is 2 player coop. So much fun!

32859483.review:
这个游戏的硬核程度实在超过我的想象……千辛万苦打金图腾中，看来全成就是没啥希望了。

这个游戏难在哪里？首先同时控制两个小人应对不同的关卡就已经很考验操作能力了，其次游戏的容错率较低，给玩家的反应时间也不多。

但是一轮玩下来不得不说，这款游戏挑战与乐趣并存！无论是单人体验、好友合作还是抖M挑战全成就都值得拥有。

另外再给游戏的整体水平点个赞。关卡设计非常优秀而有创意！色彩清爽，画面我觉得是清新可爱的风格，小人的细节也很搞笑，音乐很贴合游戏环境。

29572725.review: A unique little puzzle platformer, fun art design and a nice little story. Truly maddening and challenging in the best way as you try to navigate through the levels of Kalimba. Definitely worth the price.

29319250.review:
On est en face d'un splendide puzzle platformer.

Le concept de contrôler 2 entités avec les mêmes contrôles a deja été vu dans plusieurs jeux mais là, c'est totalement maitrisé avec un game design aux petits oignons. Le jeu est découpé en 3 series de niveaux où l'on introduit un nouveau mécanisme et qui se finit par un boss. Les challenges sont bien trouvés et assez ardus sans être trop répétitifs.

On compte environ 4 heures pour finir l'aventure solo mais si vous cherchez l'or partout et tous les achievements vous pouvez compter bien plus.

Du côté de la mascotte qui brise le 4ème mur, elle m'a arraché un paquet de sourires. On regrettera juste que les niveaux coop demandent d'être sur le même PC.

29087053.review:
[h1]This is my 500th Steam review![/h1]

I wanted to share something really special for this milestone event. I have been pouring over different titles for almost two weeks now. I wanted to review something that really showcases the greatness and power of independant game developement. As many of you know, I have a strong passion for indie games, and their ability to really push video games forward as works of art.

[b][i]Kalimba[/i] is a superb single-or-local-co-op experience that totally redefines puzzle platforming.[/b] This title should be a case study in any video game design course. Not only are the puzzles fantastically fun, but the artwork, music, and characters are outstanding. This is a must-have for anyone who wants to play from the couch, and even more so if you have a friend (or five! - yes this can get crazy).

[i]Essentially, each IRL player controls two wooden logs (totem pole segments) at the same time.[/i] Different colored totem sections can only go into like colors, which is where the puzzles begin. Your brain will twist, and you will struggle, and then you will rejoice when you succeed. In that order. The levels are devilishly difficult, but this is balanced by them being fairly short so you don't get too frustrated. I've mostly played local co-op with my wife and we have just had such a blast screaming at each other. 

[b]Pros:[/b]
+Brilliantly done game mechanic of controlling multiple totem pole units to create a fantastic puzzle platformer
+Wonderful artwork, music, and character personalities
+Controller support is great
+Very difficult, yet do-able; puzzles are a nice length, and their are plenty of checkpoints
+I think the DLC is mandatory if you plan on buying the base game, but either way there is a ton of content
+Up to 6 local players at once!!!

[b]Cons:[/b]
-You will scream at your friends

[b]I love games that make you rethink whole genres and paradigms, and this one does just that.[/b] That's the beauty of smaller scale games - they make risky decisions that often pay off with potent experiences that so often the AAA games lack. [i]Kalimba[/i] is a hidden gem that deserves to be in anyone's library who loves to play games from the couch.

Totally worth it (DLC and all), at full price.

[b]Thank you to everyone who has followed, commented, read, hated, upvoted and downvoted my reviews. I love you all![/b]

I got this game based on its good reviews and thought it would be great to play with one of my friends as it was listed as a coop game on Steam, so I actually bought two copies. Was very disappointed to find out it was only local co op and it seems the devs have no intention on adding an online coop option.

It is a great fun game to play on your own, no doubt about it, but I feel its competitive elements would be far more enjoyable if there were more online options available, especially for people who don't generally have any local gamer friends to stop by their place :P

26008522.review:
Hidden gem amongst puzzle platformers.

Excellent game playing single or local co-op. Mostly pleasing mechanics and the gameplay feels precise. I loved the art style and whimsical music. The game is also forgiving when playing casually, but it can be frustratingly hard if you are aiming for the gold totem (0 deaths, all collectibles gathered) on every level. 

My only gripe with this game is that the co-op is on the short side. 10 short levels and 10 more with DLC, the co-op is over in 2-3 hours. It also focuses on the stacking mechanic, whereas the single player has more different puzzle types. Definitely experience Kalimba co-op, but for longer similar co-op  only experience, check out Ibb & Obb.

这款游戏我最早是在XB360玩的，在STEAM上玩了DLC，非常喜欢，强烈推荐 
1 看似每个角色只有颜色区别 到后期你就会发现每个角色有自己的特性。颜色鲜艳不刺眼，适合全年龄
2 游戏的难度平衡的非常好，整体不缺乏难度，但是对新手来说又很亲和，你死的不要不要的 不会让你从头来过。但是获得70分的黄金图腾奖励又非常吸引人
3 多人模式是个非常可惜的设定，我觉得是因为从XB移植的关系，XB上面也是本地合作。所以不太可能在STEAM上变成联机合作，对于单身狗来说【受到了998点伤害】因为多人模式更好玩！图也不同！

画面 8/10
音乐 7/10
剧情 -/-
游戏性 9/10
总评 8/10

[b]单人模式：[/b]
诶诶，小蓝你悠着点！我接到你了！好，换你接我！
我帮你踩着机关呢，你放心过吧！
小绿我们再对换一次，好嘞~
哟哟哟哟哟，小黄你怎么变这么大了，那你背着我啊？
小心着点蚊子，诶，好的，我看着呢！
小红溜过前面这段我们就到终点啦！
诶？你们干嘛？？我不是精神分裂！！

[b]合作模式：[/b]
游戏开始前
我：“今天我们一定好好配合，争取全金图腾！”
基友：“嗯！”

游戏中
“你怎么死得比我少？”
“我真的不是故意卡着你的，你看我真挚的眼神”
“CNM，墙掉下来了！你踩着机关别走啊！”
“老子这段冰滑得都要吐了，你怎么还过不去？你是不是手残？”
“蚊子过来了！这次又过不了了，不如你去送吧，我都死了二十次了。”
“啊啊啊哈哈哈哈嗷嗷嗷卧槽nmb你以为我会放你过去？”
“这把只拿了个木桩怎么想都是你的锅！”
根本停不下来！

10/10

[spoiler]这游戏我是3大妈正版通的关，steam上买了又来回味一发（主要是解锁成就）。但说句真心的，steam版在标题界面和游戏的某些时候会出现卡顿，破解版反而没这个问题，流畅的一逼，这点让我很是郁闷。游戏没有中文，但还是很容易看懂剧情的，退一万步说，你全程不看剧情也能通关，而且对游戏体验的影响微乎其微。总而言之，这个游戏的BGM和创意，尤其是创意，原价入也是值得的[/spoiler]

21210509.review:
Fantasticly made co-op puzzle-platformer that really makes you think and coordinate with your team-mate.

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=623463807

I've played throught the first world so far with a friend and attempted some speedruns and perfect levels and we both had a lot of fun doing so.

You only have to think about moving and jumping but when you consider you are controlling two characters combined with coordinating with your partners two characters this can create a nice amount of depth to the game.  It creates moves like "quadruple jump" and also situations where you have to stack your characters in particular color order to navigate passed obstacles!

This is a great example of how a co-op game should be!

17044924.review:
ひとつの入力で二体いる自キャラを同時に操作する
言ってしまえば横スクACT版のバイナリィランド by HUDSON
けど何かの後追いであると表現するのを躊躇うほど
加えてある新味が秀逸で出立点を遥かに超えて面白い

任意に出来る動作はジャンプと位置の入れ替えのみで
ジャンプを押せば二体は同時に跳んで同じように落下し
自分と同じ色のモヤモヤであれば触れても平気なので
色違いの自キャラと入れ替え進むというシンプルルール

それでいて触れた方だけ性能を変化させるオブジェクトが
登場すると単なるシンクロ動作ゲーでは留まらなくなり、
程よい難易度のレベルデザインと合わせて使用ボタン数
たった二個のなんだったらファミコンのコントローラーで
足りてしまう操作性でよくこれを作ったなと感心する出来


例えば片方だけを重力反転させるオブジェクトがあり
正常な奴が上側に、反転した奴が下側にいるときには
二体とも画面の中央に向かって引き合うように落下し
お互いの足の裏を足場として多少は弾むが安定する

その状態で位置を入れ替えると今度は上の奴は上に、
下の奴はどこまでも下に落下して行ってしまうので
結果として位置の入れ替えボタンだったはずのものは
二体間の引力／斥力切り換えボタンのように振る舞う

片方の性能が変化するオブジェクトに触れるたびに
位置の入れ替えボタンに新たな意味・機能が産まれる
この感覚がなんだか妙に脳みそをくすぐられる


四角いドットではなく三角で構成されてるせいで
真っ直ぐな縦線が引けないアートワークも味があるし
これはもっと評価されていいゲームだと思う

16270030.review: I came into the game loving it. The meta hoebear was kinda funny and cool, the story was intruiging enough, and the graphics looked nice. The first few levels took some brain tugging, but nothing overly complex. When the game introduced changeable gravity the game went from recommend to not. If you are using the keyboard you are forced to use left control as the gravity switcher. It might seem fine, but when you have to make twitchy moves it becomes impossible because you cannot use the right arrow and control at the same time. If the devs added in changeable controls I would return to the game. For now I'll let it sit in the library.

15698720.review:
[h1] Graficzny minimalistyczny masterpiece,- grywalne cudo [/h1]

Kalimba to świat, w którym dzieje się nasza opowieść. To w nim zły szaman zaczął panować nad zamieszkującym go ludem i sprowadził na niego wiele nieszczęść. Na pomoc w jego pokonaniu wyruszają dwa totemy. Wiem, że brzmi to śmiesznie, ale wierzcie mi – to całkiem sensowna i cholernie wciągająca gra, która dzięki swojej retro grafice jest jeszcze lepsza. Naszym celem jest pokonywanie kolejnych, coraz to bardziej niebezpiecznych leveli. Pod drodze zbieramy znajdźki, które tak naprawdę są nam potrzebne tylko do podsumowania planszy. Gdy zbierzemy je wszystkie i nie zginiemy ani razu – otrzymamy złoty totem, czyli najwyższą ocenę w grze. Co jakiś czas przyjdzie nam powalczyć z bossem. Eh, co tu się dzieje. Trzeba tu mieć podzielność uwagi i zręczne palce. Każdy najmniejszy błąd cofa nas do początku.

Co takiego trudnego jest w podróży przez kolejne poziomy? Przede wszystkim każdy z totemów ma inny kolor. I może się poruszać po półkach neutralnych i tych w jego kolorze. Nie może też wpaść do cieczy koloru innego niż on sam. Poza tym rzadko totemy spotykają się w tym samym miejscu

„Kalimba” jest wymagającym tytułem. Należy do gier, które są łatwe do nauczenia, ale trudne do wymasterowania. Trzeba bowiem poświęcić bardzo dużo czasu, aby zdobyć złote medale na każdej planszy.

15669961.review:
I'm the kind of guy who really likes co-op platformers.  So I'd been chomping at the bit since I heard about the game last December.  And Kalimba did not disappoint!  Some notes:

* stacking is harder than it looks... you need a ledge or a hole or something to do it
* more platform-y than puzzle-y
* difficult, but not extremely so (as some reviews implied)
* did not cause any existential marriage crises (as some reviews warned)
* got very exciting at some points
* similar feel to ibb&obb, but we liked Kalimba much better
* visual style is very nice
* lots of jokes that are ... somewhat funny

The scoring system is up to 70 points for getting all the goodies, minus 1 for each death.  The goodies are kept even when you die.  So you can get a pretty good score without being amazing, but it's quite hard to get all 70 points (and a golden totem).

The game is VERY short.  We completed all 20 co-op levels (so including dark void DLC) in 3 hours.  We didn't get 70 points in all the levels, and I'd say there's about a 50-50 chance that we care enough to go back.  Many of the levels introduced interesting gamplay mechanics, but by the end thing started to feel same-y.

So if you want to play a co-op puzzle platformer and you and your partner are both decent at platformers, then get this game!

15669267.review:
Vale cada centavo!

O jogo sempre apresenta novos desafios e cenários INCRÍVEIS!

Você tem que ter esse jogo na sua conta!

15656892.review:
This is a pretty simple action-platformer with a bunch of neat puzzles built into its unique movement mechanic. I didn't try improving my scores, but the ranking system that puts deaths and collectibles in a tug of war is really smart. Great art and audio. Hoe Bear as a story teller is a little out of place, but I still enjoy the silliness in the writing.

Overall it's a great game that ends before it outstays its welcome. The DLC adds some cool mechanics and is a little harder, but it made me sad to see what becomes of the characters that I enjoyed pre-DLC.

15637116.review:
Si vous aimez les défis, avoir le meilleur score, rechercher la perfection dans les actions ! Kalimba est fait pour vous !!
Un jeu ou l'on contrôle deux petit totem qui doivent compter sur l'hablité de nous joueurs pour avancer dans des niveau qui demande sans cesse plus de dextérité, de contrôle et de patiente !! Bref une vrai perle.
Une petite perle que je recommande chaudement à tous et à toute !
A 10€ en plus il serai triste de ce privée de ce jeu original qui apporte un challenge de première ordre !

15634326.review: 好游戏，个人感觉流程太短不够玩。

15581025.review: Kalimba is a great game that is really clever and provides the player with a nice mix of both action and puzzles. The sound, art and gameplay are all fantastic and really sets this game apart from other puzzle-platformers. The co-op is is a mix of coordination, frustration and fun which will test even the best of friendships. All in all well worth the $ albeit a bit short.

15575789.review:
Let me first acknowledge that I didn't do enough research on the game; it's MY fault that I bought the game thinking there was online co-op when there isn't.  I enjoy the game, the little bit that I've played I think the mechanics are fun, and the gameplay is challenging.

That said, I think that it's simply inconceivable in the year 2015 to not have online co-op as an option.  I've heard people say, "it's just not possible to play this over the internet, the amount of communication the players need to have simply makes it impossible to play online."  I think that's just a crock of bologna, team speak, Skype, Mumble, Vent and any number of other VOIP services mean that you can have just as much communication over the web as you can with somebody sitting in the same room.

I think this game definitely has that nostalgic feel to it, but for a modern age, like an evolved Mario or Kirby but I just can't believe it doesn't have online co-op.

购买了但是出现黑屏问题的各位
我找到了解决方法

steam 库 右键游戏 属性 测试 许可代码输入“blackkalimba”（注意 是小写） 检查代码 然后在“请选择您想要参加的测试”里选“video_bug_…（略 就这一个）***然后会提示更新游戏 更新完就能玩了 亲测

此方法为steam社区中心官方给的方法 请放心使用
麻烦各位把此评论顶上去或传递下去 评论里我看到有些人有这个问题 感激不尽

15507181.review: very enjoyable game play, very polished - works great on XBox360 controller...  the game is fun and makes your brain a good massage.

15499562.review:
真的，好久没玩到这么有趣的游戏了。这个游戏真是充满了各种可能性，前期你可能觉得它就是类似森林冰火人那样的flash小游戏。可到了后期，这游戏鬼畜的简直难以想象。充满了各种各样的元素，解谜与动作兼备，而且还有收集与排名要素，让你完全玩的乐此不疲，十分有意思。
关卡创造方面，让我想到了很多i wanna游戏（虽说I wanna也是各种借鉴，比方说VVVVVVVVVV什么的），而且一人操控两人真的是容易精分，大脑崩溃。这点不是吓人的，游戏后期需要各种跳切相结合，一个人玩脑子经常会跟不上手速，各种出错。不过这难度也是我推荐这游戏的原因之一，建议手残玩家可以考虑联机一起玩，这样会相对简单一些。
总体来说，我十分推荐这款游戏，目前联机好像只有本地，唯一的遗憾

强烈推荐

While it may be a great game, I cant recomend it for anyone looking to get an online coop experience.

15496772.review:
Kalimba is a must-play for anyone who grew up playing games like Super Mario World and Kirby. This spiritual game effectively captures the spirit of the difficult traversing of a platformer mixed with a brilliant swapping puzzle mechanic that works without fail.

Read the full review at GeeksUnderGrace.com

15493566.review:
The video review is here: http://youtu.be/JxQg4_qM-I8

After beating the first act, here are some thoughts about the game:
[list]
[*]The artstyle is farily distinct and not that common at all.
[*]The soundtrack and sounddesign is really nicely done.
[*]The levels are designed pretty well, though they are quite linear.
[*]The first bossfight was, as expceted, a big mashup of previous mechanics, which is not necessarily bad.  
[*]The game works fine with the keyboard, however playing it on a TV with a controller is even more recommended, especially for local coop.
[*]Performancewise I found nothing to complain about.
[/list]

So overall, I have to say the game is certainly worth the asking price, even moreso when you are interested in playing an interesting, challening puzzleplatformer.

Edit: as of 23. of April, the game does not feature online coop on its storepage anymore, which it did prior to release. Hopefully the devs will have a online coop implemented relatively soon.
